descript.text:
Welcome Time Officer
You are a member of an Elite Time-Police Squad sent from the year 4242 to various Time-Space anomalies. Your mission is to prevent catastrophic events from ever occuring, thus ensuring the continued survival of the sponge race and our prosperous existance.                                       Armed with your mighty Space-Techno UltraBat 8000, you and your small-but-loyal companion must embark on a journey through time and space to the year 2012. It is up to you to save this planet from the impending Mayan Doom!!!
